column4: hmm having issues with frostwire (and limewire) when I try to run them I get this (from console): http://www.bigbold.com/snippets/posts/show/2333
I've installed the latest java following the ubuntu wiki
I followed the wiki to the letter, and according to those errors it does find it in the paths
huh thats bizarre, it returns: java version "1.4.2"
it might be finding gjc or whatever
nothing, but I also had installed the latest java so it should show version 1.5x as far as I know
its an ubuntu package... so whereever it wanted to
I'd find it and set JAVA_HOME to that place.  Maybe /usr/lib/jdk1.5* or something
I uninstalled the gjc and i can run those programs now... should that be an ok thing to do btw?
yeah, gcj is a piece of crap
:)  you the same guy with a creative media player?
I was until I dropped it for the 30th time :P now I'm suffering with an ipod (can't stand it)
I got an ipod too.  I absolutely love it.
someone broke into my car and stole my creative.
